data.title: Fun place with fantastic selection of beers on tap
data.text: What can you say about that many different beers on tap other than  its fantastic. Food selection is good, but the better choices are typical tavern style eats. Service was fantastic for us.

data.title: great food
data.text: food was really good and the service was excellent. happy hour prices are a good deal and drink prices are also good.

data.title: Fun place to drink and watch a game
data.text: The menu is above average. The drinks are really good, and the atmosphere is really fun. Good place to go just have fun, visit with friends or watch a game. Got have the yard drink too, haha

data.title: Fantastic food!
data.text: Oh my - the extensive menu - both food and beer on tap made it difficult to choose. Every bite was fantastic. I wish I could start all over again. The place was packed but well worth the wait. Staff were friendly and service was bar bar none.

data.title: Great Atmosphere
data.text: I thought it was going to be a noisy sports bar. I was pleasantly surprised how nice it was to get a drink. The beer selection was awesome !!

data.title: Great selection of local beers
data.text:
A friend of mine, a real beer afficionado and a frequent visitor to San Diego, recommended a visit to the Yard House. They do have a fantastic selection of beers. Their beer menu alone is like 5 pages long, arranged by style. We arrived just before the end of happy hour, so ordered some tasty brews and a selection of appetizers to share in lieu of ordering from the dinner menu: crab cakes, "vampire" tacos (deep fried or baked or something wild), calamari. They brought the wrong style of calamari at first (we'd ordered the kung pao calamari) and instead of taking it off the table they left it and did not charge us for it, which I thought was a classy maneuver. The food was enjoyable. 
The restaurant is dimly lit and furnished in burly, masculine style. Big comfy booths. The waitstaff were super friendly and made good beer suggestions when we shared our preferences (IPA for me, stouts for my friend). 
Cool place.

data.title: Superb
data.text: Went here must days we were in San Diego and regretted the days we did not go. Fantastic choice of beer. Great menu plenty of vegetarian choices. Wish we lived closer.  Helpful staff. 10/10

data.title: Very cool
data.text:
This was my first bar I visited on my tour of the states. Gotta say I was impressed. Beers & drinks as far as the eyes can see- & from every corner of the globe! 
A little bit expensive- so you prob wouldn't come here every night of the week- but it was great!!!

data.title: SO Good
data.text: Go during happy hour so it's a little more affordable. If you like beer, you need to check this place out. I've had a few different things from the menu and can honestly say that it's all good :) I highly recommend the ahi poke bowl to start with.

data.title: Great Atmosphere, Very Friendly Service, and Great Beer Selection
data.text: Was sat immediately upon arriving, server was easily available without being obnoxious and you can't look down on a 100+ beer selection from across the globe.  The food was well above average, especially since Yard House is not what I would consider expensive.  I was especially happy with the crème brûlée, despite the fact that a true restauranteur would probably say it was only on par.  Nonetheless, it was super tasty!  Definitely have a stop at this location as it is the largest Yard House location (sq. ft.) of all of them.

data.title: Great beer
data.text: Great beer , good atmosphere ! The beers pipes are really cool how they run thru the entire restaurant

data.title: A Sports Bar with lots of Beer
data.text: If you would like to try lots of beers go for it. The service is not the best, they are slow and food is very but very average if not below average. The atmosphere is OK but as an overall restaurant. I would go somewhere else for the cost.

data.title: Nice beer but service inconsistent
data.text:
Been twice. First time service enthusiastic and any delay in delivery of food / drink made up for by friendly service. Yesterday went in happy hour and service was very slow and unfriendly. Tipped well first visit and poorly second visit-  hopefully if more people do that the message will get across...!

Food and drink good though so would only need consistently good service to get five stars from me.

data.title: No thanks.
data.text: I would not recommend this restaurant. .    Food very very average.   Service very slow and with an attitude.

data.title: Come here for the draft beer list
data.text:
With over 100 brews on tap and good happy hour specials, this is a place I'd go back to again.  

The beer menu is impressive, and the brews are listed by category, which is nice for visitors like me who want to sample local brews, but need help narrowing down the list. Any beer drinker can find something to his/her liking here. If you find something you REALLY like, go for the half yard--that's a lot of beer. 

If beer isn't your thing, this might not be your thing either. The menu isn't bad or particularly exciting--it's pretty standard American fare. I had a turkey burger that was tasty with a side salad. Honestly, though, I'd go back for the extensive beer list. Did I mention that they have a wide variety of beers?

data.title: Great beer house!
data.text:
Yard house is a great resteraunt! They sell all kinds of beer from very light airy crisp beers to dark heavy bitter beer. They serve it in three ways: shorty, pint and the half yard. The half yard Is a lot of beer!
The food is outstanding! They have small portions and regular portions. I had the small chicken bowl and I couldn't finish that, I would be amazed to see the regular portion. 
The price was to be expected but worth the experience. Great place to go on a date night or after sight seeing.

data.title: Used to be great
data.text: This place used to be great when it had a downstairs dancefloor. Now it's just another downtown chain restaurant. Pass.

data.title: Went for a beer but got great food!
data.text: My wife and I stopped here on the advice of a family member as we are big drinkers and this place has TONS of draft beers. We wanted to have a yard and since it was around lunchtime we decided tograb something to eat.We were very suprised. We had agrilled artichoke which was great as well as some fish tacos and a roast beef dip. We thought everything was great so don't be scared to try it. This IS NOT bar food. There is a great ambiance there and the design of the place was great. All in all, this was a great place and we were glad we came.

data.title: O lugar para excelentes cervejas em San Diego
data.text:
Adoramos conhecer a Yard House em San Diego.
O local é amplo, super bem decorado, com serviço de primeira.
São inúmeras cervejas especiais e pratos típicos deliciosos - como o Jambalaya.
Recomendo!!!
